attributes.action: The new priminister must be from BREXIT LEAVE campaign as the people have spoken
attributes.additional_details: Michael Gove,Boris Johnson,Andrea leadsom,Nigel Farage should all be in the running,shame there's not a mixture of both parties that fought for brexit both labour and conservative etc as they all fought to leave.we have to have a leave pm as else it's going against what the everyday people wanted and politicians need to actually listen to us.we are fed up with being back of the queue and just expecting to shut up and put up please sign this petition and spreed the word ,we will get what we want
attributes.background: Someone from brexit should take control as we don't want free movement of people and we don't need to have the single market we can now trade with anyone all over the world and stop what we have been forced to except.shame it's not like a committee taking us forward of a mixture of all the brexit

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
